events.message: I recently bought a pair of headphones from your store, but I want to request a refund because the product doesn’t meet my expectations and I’m unhappy with the quality.
The customer issue has been reviewed and categorized under the Refund cluster based on keywords indicating dissatisfaction and refund request.
An available support agent has been assigned to handle this refund request to ensure a prompt and smooth resolution process.
Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent purchase. I am here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know the reason why the product did not meet your expectations to proceed with the refund?
My order number is 123456789. The headphones sound quality is poor, and they do not match the description on your site, so I want my money back.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund once we receive the returned headphones. I will send you a prepaid shipping label so you can return the item free of charge.
That sounds good, thank you. I appreciate the quick response and the help with returning the product without extra cost.
The return shipping label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the product, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that your refund has been successfully processed. Please let us know if you have any other concerns.
Since your refund issue is resolved, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and feel free to contact us again anytime.
